page.title: 20GENERAL WRITTEN DESCRIPTION
page.content: The study area contains one village, namely Tremeirchion , a village of approximately 400 inhabitants,many of whom fall into the middle class sector.Over 40 percent are retired couples.The village school is a Welsh medium school , although only a small percentage of the villagers speak Welsh many of the school's pupils travel to school from Welsh speaking farming homes.The remainder of the study area is made up of a number of medium sized farms , milking being prominent in the lowlying areas , beef stock rearing,and sheep farming in the hilly areas, and cereal production in the intermediate areas.
